column4: thanks for the nomodeset info. That did help with the inital corrupt splash screen, but after that I still have a blank screen.
did you try the recovery kernel in grub , choose repair broken packages in the dialog , then reboot

repair broken packages did the trick - thanks for teaching me to fish.
